subject: Golf
PGA Championship

Boxing
lead_paragraph: Francesca Schiavone advanced at the Rogers Cup women’s tennis event in Toronto and golfers completed their final practice rounds ahead of the P.G.A. Championship in Johns Creek, Ga.
